summary: Project includes an admin dashboard that should be placed prominently by displaying the dashboard directly on the homepage, visible to all users, labeled “dashboard.”

existing_features.title: Render the existing dashboard content directly on the homepage and make it visible to all users without requiring Internet Identity authentication, while keeping the existing protected /dashboard route unchanged.
Add an in-page navigation affordance so the dashboard is easy to find from the top of the homepage (e.g., a "dashboard" link that scrolls to the dashboard section).

new_feature_requests.summary: Display the admin dashboard directly on the homepage (visible to all users) and label it “dashboard.”

projectName: Display the dashboard directly on the homepage (publicly visible)
